import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate,Link}from"react-router-dom";import"../styles.css";import"particles.js";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminLogin=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{// Load particles.js config (same as Login.jsx)

",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",children:"User Login"})]})]})]})]});};export default AdminLogin;
